```go
type Config struct {
    Prometheus PrometheusConfig
    Kafka      []KafkaConfig

}
```

## type KafkaConfig

```go
type KafkaConfig struct {
    BootstrapServer string
    Topic           string
    Tls             TlsConfig
    ProducerConfig  ProducerConfig
    ConsumerConfig  ConsumerConfig
}
```

```go
    MessagesSecond int32
```

## type TlsConfig

```go
type TlsConfig struct {
    Enabled     bool
    ClusterCert string
    ClientCert  string
    ClientKey   string
}
```
